nodes.text: Nalyd was a planet, and home of the Nalydians. It was a planet of swirling orange fog and its surface was covered by towering mesas and pinnacles. Nalyd's cities were built around these pinnacles. The planet was also home to two non-sentient giant spider and a floating jellyfish species. The inhabitants practiced death penalties on citizens who had broken the law, and it was here that Ania Solo and Jao Assam, went to look for Darth Wredd's minion Dieben in 138 ABY.
